alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:29AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches with up to 3 inches around Bondurant. Winds gusting 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall before sunrise this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
